headline.main: Bahrain Says 25 Arrested in Bust of Iran-Linked Terror Cell
headline.print_headline: Bahrain Says 25 Arrested in Bust of Iran-Linked Terror Cell

lead_paragraph: Bahrain says it has arrested 25 suspected members of a terror group allegedly backed by Iran on the island nation.
snippet: Bahrain says it has arrested 25 suspected members of a terror group allegedly backed by Iran on the island nation....
